HomeGuard App

We developed a budget home surveillence system Android App with Firebase and Rpi as a school project.

HealthHack Hackathon 2021

My team and I designed a health monitoring app catered for diabetes patiets.

We did not win but it was a precious opportunity given to learn the basics of cyber security

FPGA project:Donuts

We made an arcade game with the Alchitry AU FPGA, programmed in Lucid.

More about me

Things I enjoy doing

Working as a team

I like to discuss with people in my team and learn from them. Exchanging and discovering ideas with people around me, it helps to broaden my horizon and think in different perspectives.

Eager to learn

I am still on my journey of learning and improving. There are many things that I don't know and I am eager to learn from the others.

I love sports!

Work hard play hard! I enjoy trying out new sports and spending time with my friends. Used to be a Malaysian Badminton State Player, but now I don't play sports competitively anymore.

I love photography too

I like to be mindfull and observe the world around me.

I enjoy reading

The "Sapiens:" series by Yuval Noah Harari is my favourite!
